pr_title: AF-2691: Open projects directly using the URL

timeline.message: AF-2691: Open projects directly using the URL
AF-2691: Open projects directly using the URL
AF-2691: Open projects directly using the URL

timeline.body:
```suggestion
        this.projectPath = (getWindowParameterMap().containsKey("path") ? getWindowParameterMap().get("path").get(0) : "").trim();
```

I think the parentheses are not necessary.
timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
this.projectPath = (((getWindowParameterMap().containsKey("path")) ? getWindowParameterMap().get("path").get(0) : "")).trim();
this.projectPath = (getWindowParameterMap().containsKey("path") ? getWindowParameterMap().get("path").get(0) : "").trim();

I think the parentheses are not necessary.
timeline.author: tomasdavidorg

timeline.message:
AF-2691: Open projects directly using the URL

timeline.body: Is this change really necessary? If so, I'll have to update this part on our JDK11 PR.

replies.bodyText: @caponetto Thanks for the review! It was necessary because now there are two goToProject methods that have one parameter.
